common.DASHBOARD_GENERATE_ORDERS_ERROR: An error occurred while creating recurring orders

common.ADMIN_PLEASE_UNLINK_TIME_SLOT_BEFORE_DEL: Could not delete. Please unlink this time slot from stores or delivery forms it may apply
common.ADMIN_DASHBOARD_CLICK_FOR_DETAILS: Click on an order to display details
common.ADMIN_DASHBOARD_ORDERS_PACKAGING_ALERT: This order must be packed in reusable packaging

common.ADMIN_DASHBOARD_FILTERS_TAGS_AND_ORGS_PL: Select a tag, a store, a restaurant, a shop...

common.ADMIN_DASHBOARD_IMPORT_FILE_FORMATS: Supported file formats: csv, ods, xlsx
common.ADMIN_DASHBOARD_MOVE_TO_NEXT_WORKING_DAY: Move {{count}} tasks to next working day ({{nextWorkingDay}})
common.RECURRENCE_RULE_DAYS_REQUIRED: Please choose at least one day
common.ADMIN_DASHBOARD_DELETE_GROUP_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to delete all the tasks in this group?
common.ADMIN_DASHBOARD_DELETE_TOUR_CONFIRM: Delete this tour and move tasks to "Unassigned"
common.ADMIN_DASHBOARD_INVALID_TASKS_SELECTION: The tasks selection is too complex to take actions on it. Please select taks in unassigned or same rider or same tour.
common.ADMIN_DASHBOARD_CAN_NOT_MOVE_FROM_GROUP_: Can not move directly individual tasks from group to assigned
common.ADMIN_DASHBOARD_CAN_NOT_MOVE_TASKS_BETWE: Can not move directly tasks between groups
common.ADMIN_DASHBOARD_GROUP_TO_UNASSIGNED: Can not move group to unassigned tasks
common.ADMIN_DASHBOARD_WAIT_FOR_PREVIOUS_ASSIGN: Waiting for previous assignment to complete
common.ADMIN_DASHBOARD_NO_COMPATIBLE_TRAILER: No compatible trailers with this bike
common.ADMIN_DASHBOARD_RECURRENCE_RULE_LEGACY_W: This is a legacy way of creating recurrence rules, please set up recurrence via a Delivery form instead.
common.ADMIN_VEHICLE_NO_WAREHOUSE: Please create a warehouse before adding vehicles: each vehicle sits in a warehouse!
common.ADMIN_VEHICLE_NO_VEHICLE: Please create a vehicle before adding trailers: each trailer is compatible to given vehicles!
common.ADMIN_DASHBOARD_OPTIMIZATION_UNASSIGNED_: {{ count }} item(s) were unassigned because it did not fit in the constraints.
common.ADMIN_DASHBOARD_OPTIMIZATION_DONE: The assignements were optimized. Previous distance was {{ previousDistance }}, previous duration {{ previousDuration }}.
common.ORDER_TIMELINE_REFUSED_DESCRIPTION: Your order cannot be prepared by the restaurant
common.ORDER_TIMELINE_AFTER_ACCEPTED_TITLE: The restaurant now needs to prepare your order
common.ORDER_TIMELINE_AFTER_ACCEPTED_DESCRIPTIO: We will keep you updated when the courier picks your order
common.ORDER_TIMELINE_AFTER_CREATED_DESCRIPTION: The restaurant has to confirm your order. In case of refusal no amount will be debited from your card
common.FORM_PRICING_RULE_SET_STRATEGY_HELP: The rules are evaluated from top to bottom, and 'Rules per point' are evaluated before 'Rules per order'. Depending on the method of calculation selected, either the first rule that matches will decide the price, or the price will be calculated by adding all the matching rules.
common.PRICING_PRICING_RULE_HELP: Rules to calculate the price of the order
common.PRICING_ADD_RULE_HELP: Add a rule to be applied once per order, recommended for simple deliveries (one pickup, one dropoff) and Food Tech orders
common.PRICING_ADD_RULE_PER_TASK_HELP: Add a rule to be applied per each point (PICKUP and/or DROPOFF task), recommended for complex, multi-point deliveries
common.RULE_TARGET_DELIVERY_HELP: Add rules to be applied once per order
common.RULE_TARGET_TASK_HELP: Add rules to be applied per each point (PICKUP and/or DROPOFF task)
common.RULE_TARGET_TASK: Apply per each point (PICKUP and/or DROPOFF task) if:
common.RULE_LEGACY_TARGET_DYNAMIC: Simple deliveries (one pickup, one dropoff): apply once per order; Multi-point deliveries: apply per each point (PICKUP and/or DROPOFF task) if:
common.RULE_LEGACY_TARGET_DYNAMIC_HELP: This rule is deprecated in favor of separate rules applied either once per order or per each point. Please consider migrating to the new format. (See the migration guide above)
common.RULE_LEGACY_TARGET_DYNAMIC_MIGRATE_RATIO: This pricing scheme contains deprecated rules applied differently for simple deliveries (one pickup, one dropoff) and complex, multi-point deliveries, making them error-prone. Thus, the usage of such rules is discouraged. Please consider migrating to the new format:
common.RULE_LEGACY_TARGET_DYNAMIC_MIGRATE_TARGE: Switch to: Apply rules once per order
(choose this option if you use this pricing scheme for Food Tech orders or simple deliveries (one pickup, one dropoff))
Switch to: Apply rules per each point (PICKUP and/or DROPOFF task)
(choose this option if you use this pricing scheme for complex, multi-point deliveries)
common.FORM_PRICING_RULE_SET_NO_RULE_FOUND: No pricing rule found. Pricing rules define how the delivery cost is calculated.
common.FORM_PRICING_RULE_SET_PRICING_RULE_NAME_: If you keep the name empty, the name will be generated automatically
common.FORM_PRICING_RULE_SAVE_ERROR: An error occurred while saving rule {{ name }}
common.FORM_PRICING_RULE_MANUAL_SUPPLEMENT_NAME: You must provide a name for the manual supplement
common.CART_ADDRESS_NOT_ENOUGH_PRECISION: This address is not precise enough

common.RESTAURANT_DASHBOARD_INFO_RUSH: Use this button to activate the 'rush' mode
common.RESTAURANT_DASHBOARD_DELAY_SETTING_HELP: The platform won't propose drop times to the customer that would imply a pickup in the next X minutes. This setting is independent from restaurant's prep time or rush mode.

common.PAYMENT_FORM_NOT_SUPPORTED: We do not (yet!) accept Ticket Restaurant cards, please use a classic credit card.

PRICE_RANGE_EDITOR.TYPE_PERCENTAGE_HELP: In most use cases, the Method of calculation: 'All the matching rules' is required for the percentage-based price.

common.GROUP_ORDER_SHARE_LINK: Share the link with others to participate in your order. Once they have finished, you can place the order.
common.ORDER_DELAYED_NOTIFICATION: Order {{orderNumber}} was delayed. New shipping time range: {{shippingTimeRange}}
common.CART_ZERO_WASTE_POPUP_TEXT: Congratulations, your cart contains a dish eligible for zero-waste delivery with our partner « {{name}} ». Have it delivered in returnable boxes and return them anywhere in the « {{name}} » network or to your courier with your next order. You can disable this option at any time.
common.CART_ZERO_WASTE_POPUP_TEXT_WITH_FEE: Congratulations, your cart contains a dish eligible for zero-waste delivery with our partner « {{name}} ». Have it delivered in returnable boxes and return them anywhere for free in the « {{name}} » network or to your courier with your next order (fee {{amount}}). You can disable this option at any time.

common.CART_LOOPEAT_MODAL_OK: Everything is good, you can finalize your order
common.CART_LOOPEAT_MODAL_NOK: {{amount}} is missing to finalize your order
common.CART_LOOPEAT_MODAL_RETURN_SECTION_SUBTIT: Return your boxes to fund your wallet

common.SWITCH_COMPLEX_DATEPICKER: Select a date over multiples days
